scripts.build-headless:linux: GOOS=linux GOARCH=amd64 go build -tags headless -o dist/linux/kie_sandbox_extended_services_headless main.go
scripts.build:linux: GOOS=linux GOARCH=amd64 go build -o dist/linux/kie_sandbox_extended_services main.go && yarn build-headless:linux
scripts.build:darwin: GO111MODULE=on GOOS=darwin GOARCH=amd64 go build -o dist/darwin/kie_sandbox_extended_services main.go

scripts.build:prod: rimraf dist jitexecutor && yarn copy-jitexecutor && yarn build && yarn run pack
